title: WTB The following lower grade southern leaguers

posts.post_title: WTB The following lower grade southern leaguers
posts.post_content:
Looking to but the following southern leaguers in lower (Fr-G) condition.  Raw is fine.  Let me know if you have any and what you would like for them.


Perdue
Fritz has been removed from the list.
One last bump.  Just looking for Perdue and Reagan to complete the southern leaguers.

PM sent on a Reagan I have.

Thanks.
Just need Perdue in case someone has one they are looking to sell.  Thanks to everyone that has helped so far.
